# Fire Alarms and Sprinklers – Inspections, Maintenance, Repair & Monitoring

## Request for Proposal – 30005330
### Tender Summary

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites proposals from qualified service providers to deliver fire alarm and sprinkler system inspections, maintenance, repair, and monitoring services for three facilities in Prince Edward Island.

#### Project Location

- DFO Summerside Search And Rescue Station, 170 Heather Moyse Drive, Summerside, PE, C1N 5Y8
- DFO Charlottetown Helicopter Hangar, 180 Maple Hills Avenue, Charlottetown, PE, C1C 1N2
- DFO Souris Search And Rescue Station, 122 Breakwater Drive, Souris, PE, C0A 2B0

#### Tender Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks a contractor to perform the following services:

1. Testing and inspection of fire alarm systems to ensure compliance with the National Fire Code of Canada and the National Building Code of Canada.
2. Providing timely and accurate reporting to facilitate corrective measures and ensure occupant safety.
3. Comprehensive monitoring services to maintain communication between the fire alarm system and a monitoring center on a 24/7 basis.

### Service Schedule

- Inspection and testing services: Monthly and annual inspections
- Reporting: Timely and accurate reporting to facilitate corrective measures
- Monitoring: Comprehensive monitoring services on a 24/7 basis

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: 2024-12-09T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-12-30
* Expected contract end date: 2026-11-30

### Eligibility

The proposed contractor must be qualified to perform fire alarm and sprinkler system inspections, maintenance, repair, and monitoring services. The contractor must also comply with relevant trade agreements and government procurement procedures.

### Proposal Submission

Qualified service providers must submit their proposals, including pricing and service schedules, by the tender closing date. Proposals must be in compliance with the RFP requirements.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Lana Hunt at lana.hunt@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or (604) 355-0314.

### Documents

The complete RFP package is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51910/30005330---rfp-%28en_final.pdf
